remarks: Lemma for ~ nobndup and ~ nobnddown .  Show a particular abstraction is an ordinal.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Aug-2011.)
statement:
nobndlem2.1 $e |- X e. { 1o , 2o } $.
nobndlem2.2 $e |- C = |^| { a e. On | A. n e. F E. b e. a ( n ` b ) =/= X } $.
nobndlem2 $p |- ( ( F C_ No /\ F e. A ) -> C e. On ) $.
$d F a b n $.
$d X a b $.
